It is possible to make your own algorithm and use the exisiting parameters

*Example:*
{{{
String algebra = "((year+year)*2)-10";
Password algebraPassword = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("pAss", algebra);

// if the year is 2011, then the result will be 'abid8034'
System.out.println(algebraPassword.getEvaluatedPassword());
}}}


{{{
String algebra = "(year-10)+zodiac";
MutablePassword algebraPassword = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("abid", algebra);

// if the date is Jan 2011 then the result will be 'abid2001Aquarius'
System.out.println(algebraPassword.getEvaluatedPassword());

// Next month the password changes to 'abid2001Pisces'
// and next year it will be ''abid2002Aquarius'
// etc
}}}
